name: Christmas with Sayori
description:
Spend time and buy a present for Sayori from DDLC! You play as the nameless protagonist who is Sayori's friend and newest member of the Literature Club. You get to ask either one of the three girls what you should buy for Sayori for Christmas, and then go to the mall and meet someone new while shopping for Sayori!

May contain spoilers for Doki Doki Literature Club and World End Syndrome!
